website_summaries.verdict: Dark Horse Comics' Android app is a necessity for Dark Horse Comics fans who buy digital titles, but it could learn a thing or two from Comixology's Android Comics app.
cons: Panel Zoom not as good as Comixology's Guided View

customer_reviews.title: Please Approve for Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I realize this is beta, But please approve for Kindle Fire. This apparently is a separate approval process according to DH. App works great on iOS, but I would like to test drive it on the Fire. In addition (Edited March 17), it has been two months since my original review. DH Comic App is now at version 1.0.3, and still without an approval for Kindle Fire. Please Approve!
customer_reviews.author: J. Barbee

customer_reviews.title: Great comics Conan the Samerian personal favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great comics Conan the Samerian personal favorite. The only let down is when the frames dont load fast enough, other than that comic prices are right.
customer_reviews.author: True_True2100

customer_reviews.title: It works great on all my android stuff
customer_reviews.text: Four years on and Amazon still hasn't approved this app, very disappointing. It works great on all my android stuff. When the currant Kindle needs replaced I'll be staying with android instead. The app on android works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon hurry up and approve this!
customer_reviews.text: I emailed DH support about Kindle Fire support and they are still (as of January 17th) waiting on Amazon to get back with them on the approval of this app for the Fire. The Kindle Fire would be the ideal device for this app and Amazon needs to get off of their keesters and approve this app!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's goodIt's good stuff very pleased with the product and i got exactly what i expected and didn't get something that i didn't expect
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bagley

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work on Sony Xperia S
customer_reviews.text: I was looking foward to having the app, but had to remove it from my Sony Xperia because it crashed the system. Sorry, if it ran, I might be able to rate it higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Dark Horse just not their prices they do give out enough freebies to feel your cup though.
customer_reviews.author: I Just Shop Here

customer_reviews.title: Pulled the app remotely and now it will not reinstall???
customer_reviews.text: Looks like Amazon pulled this app remotely... I had to finangle a way to install it on my Fire initially , and it worked great, just couldn't buy comics with it. (I would just syc it to my account then download them.) Approve it for the Kindle already!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: very cool, indeed.
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy reading comics, Then you should Enjoy Dark Horse....and If you enjoy them and are a Predator/ Alien Fan, then this is the app for you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. Becker

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: synced my account just fine...seems to be less crash-prone than the DH app is on my IPod Touch. Excited to catch up on some DH series like Buffy & House of Night on my larger Nook screen
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: No HDX!  Why??
customer_reviews.text: Make available for kindle HDX !! Comixology works, so why I can't this? Hurry up and make it so I can access my already paid library.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Like to read on Kindle Fire HD
customer_reviews.text: Ok I have apple but I would like to get my son into comics and I bought him a kindle Fire HD, I think until Amazon does something he will have to wait Sorry Dark Horse. He could read one I collect but can not touch. What a way to get the next gen involved in comics until they understand the value of a collection.
customer_reviews.author: MTGAHC

customer_reviews.title: Did not use it much
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I did not use this much. You need a constant internet to enjoy this app. If you have internet on everywhere you go Im sure this app. Is ok to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: APPROVE THIS FOR KINDLE FIRE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Please get this working for the kindle fire. I don't want to have to use my iTouch to use this app.
customer_reviews.author: Seym56

customer_reviews.title: Please Approve for Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing this app for my Kindle Fire. I've sideloaded this app onto my Kindle Fire. It is beta software, but it works fine on my Kindle Fire. Please approve the app!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio B. McDonough

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way To Enjoy A Boatload Of Great Comics
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall is that you cannot make in App purchases. Directed me to their website to set up an account. Purchases were pretty easy after that. About 15-20 minutes they were visible in App, ready for download.
customer_reviews.author: tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but not available for the Fire.
customer_reviews.text: Great app that's perfectly functional and easy to use. Just one question: why isn't it available for the original Kindle Fire? Put it out for the tablet this store was made for. Also, please provide the updated version. As of 5/1/2013, the current version on Google Play is 1.2.5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Well Executed
customer_reviews.text: It does everything you could expect from an app like this. Simple to use. Wish the two bigger publishers were this easy.
customer_reviews.author: DocStockton

customer_reviews.title: No Kindle Fire support!?
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to see that DH had finally released the Android app (even if it is only a beta version) but why can't I dowload it to my Fire? It doesn't even show up on the list of apps. Please make this app available for the KF!
customer_reviews.author: Matador_73

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be On Kindle Fire!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good app that is worth using on any android device. Quality manga and comics available digital from a great American distributor. This app needs to be approved for Kindle Fire! Come on Amazon, what are you thinking? You got the Viz Media app approved for Kindle Fire. Now you need another great official source of manga and comics.
customer_reviews.author: wintersnowcloud

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be on kindle fire.
customer_reviews.text: Great app for the comic reader on the go.Wish this app worked on kindle fire HD come on Amazon get your stuff together
customer_reviews.author: rxb

customer_reviews.title: Would love to see it on my Fire
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I would love to see this app approved by Amazon. There is a way to install it through DH's website. For those interested, just add /fire to the end of the Dark Horse url and follow the instructions. When/if this app becomes available for my Kindle, I'll be more than happy to download through Amazon, but until then I'll settle on what I have now.
customer_reviews.author: SammyK

customer_reviews.title: Great app... Needs to be approved for Kindle Fire!
customer_reviews.text: I have discovered the joys of this app on my Samsung Stratosphere and am now fully positive that Amazon needs to get on approving this app for the Kindle Fire. It's great to have all my Dark Horse comics at my disposal, but they would be so much more enjoyable on the spacious screen of my Kindle rather than sucking the battery life of my tiny smartphone. I definitely give the app 5 stars. Just wish I could use it on my Kindle!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn

customer_reviews.title: APPROVE THIS FOR KINDLE FIRE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For gods sake Amazon, Approve this for the Kindle fire already! I know it's been sitting in the reviewing process since the Android app was first created. GET ON THE BALL! This is the main reason I bought a Fire!
customer_reviews.author: ZenArchon

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY!!!??? AMAZON APPROVE THIS APP for FIRE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very confused why this app still has not been enabled for my Fire. I too, bought the FIRE to be a comic reader and it is 50% functional. Half of my digital comics are on DKHD. Please get moving and stop allowing COMIXOLOGY A VIRTUAL MONOPOLY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Cowing

customer_reviews.title: Like everyone else says, Put this on Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.text: The app on my android and iphone are great. I want this on my Kindle Fire HD, the main reason I bought one was for digital comics. It's one of the few negatives I have about the fire. Give us this app please. Amazon and Dark Horse you have potential customers wanting to give you their money. Please work something out. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Get on the ball, Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Seriously what is the hold up on this app? I'm completely digital with my comics now except for Dark Horse because this app is being held up for the Kindle Fire. Make it happen.
customer_reviews.author: Harv W

customer_reviews.title: KINDLE FIRE???
customer_reviews.text: This still won't work on the Fire? I want to read my purchased comics on something bigger than my phone...I was thinking of upgrading my Fire, but this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: William Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Approve for Kindle Fire!
customer_reviews.text: I'm joining the list of people who are saying this in the hope that, because if enough do so, the ball will finally get rolling. Hurry and approve this app for the Kindle Fire! I have Comixology, but Dark Horse doesn't have any comics on there so I can't read any titles I like from them, like Star Wars and Usagi Yojimbo. So please, get the kinks worked out and get this app approved for the Kindle Fire. So many comic book fans, myself included, would be oh so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Mullin

customer_reviews.title: If Only Amazon would approve for the Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: App works fine on my Galaxy Note. I find it's use of zoomed panels far superior to the way Amazon's own graphic novel "zoom" function works. Need it on my Fire soon, however. That's the better reading size, but no love from Amazon yet. I hope they hurry up.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Lee Soule

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recently disappointed in my Kindle purchase can't believe how many apps I can't use or are not compatible
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Kindle Fire Support
customer_reviews.text: I got the Kindle Fire for Christmas and it's really getting on my nerves that this app has not been approved. GET IT DONE! Please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Approve for Kindle Fire already!
customer_reviews.text: Add me to the bandwagon of people clamoring for this app to be approved for the Kindle Fire! Like other commenters here, reading comics was the main reason I bought the Kindle Fire. I already have a large library of Dark Horse digital comics and I want to read them on my Kindle Fire. Maybe I should just bite the bullet and replace my Kindle with an iPad Mini...
customer_reviews.author: Jim McVay

customer_reviews.title: KINDLE FIRE ALREADY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IM A BUFFY COMIC FAN AND WOULD LIKE TO SEE IT ON MY NEW FIRE SOMETIME SOON. PLEASE HURRY NOW NOW NOW. EVEN DARK HORSE IS WAITING SO STOP HORSING AROUND.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this simple. Love what Dark Horse is doing with digital comics but I want to read comic books on my KINDLE FIRE, not on my phone. Let make this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Fire?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the only way to read a comic is either on actual paper or on a tablet. PLEASE put this on the Kindle Fire, Amazon! It's kind of ridiculous they haven't already, considering how popular Dark Horse Comics is and especially with a new Star Wars movie on the way...this is inexcusable. Please make this happen!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Brady Gorman

customer_reviews.title: I Want this on my Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I Want this app for my Kindle Fire...I want to read Hellboy on my vacation in June..chop chop...do it..still waiting
customer_reviews.author: Hulkzilla

customer_reviews.title: KINDLE FIRE PLEEEEASE
customer_reviews.text: Please, please, PLEASE. Reading my comics on my phone is just depressing. I don't even understand why this is an issue!
customer_reviews.author: Chamberly

customer_reviews.title: Want for Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: I am completely confused as to why this cannot work on the Fire. Amazon is pushing towards the Nexus 7
customer_reviews.author: NateHam
